attributes.action: Bring Back Corporal Punishment in schools to learn the young the meaning of right from wrong.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some twenty years ago  if you were in school and stepped out of line you were disciplined. However now they  don't even get told off. How can they learn if they do not get a punishment. We have the nuclear bomb as a deterant so use corporal punishment as a deterent aswell.
The youngsters see an Asbo as an achievement. So I say bring back canning as a deterent in Schools.

rejection.details: this theme has been covered in several other petitions
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
